players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "'I believe we should focus our suspicion on Charlie, as he was the one found dead last night.'..."
You: "'I agree with Bob that we should investigate Charlie's death further. Let's discuss any clues or suspicions we have.'"

Bob: "Let's not forget that we found a mysterious note at the scene of Charlie's death. It read, 'The game is afoot.' I think this could be a clue left by Charlie himself or perhaps an accomplice trying to mislead us. We..."

You: "'I think we should not jump to conclusions too quickly based on the note alone. It could be a simple reference to Sherlock Holmes or any other popular phrase. Let's try to gather more information before making any accusations. We need to keep an open mind and..."

Diana: "I think we should not ignore the fact that I was the last person to have seen Charlie alive. It's true that we need to keep an open mind, but we also can't disregard the possibility that I might have had a role in his death..."

Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
